content.description:
. . . namque avia cursu

dum sequor et nota excedo regione viarum,

heu misero coniunx fatone erepta Creusa

substitit, erravitne via seu lassa resedit,

incertum. . .
content.question: Write out and translate two Latin clauses from lines 1-2 (namque . . . viarum) that describe Aeneas' location.

frqParts.text: Write out and translate two Latin clauses from lines 1-2 (namque . . . viarum) that describe Aeneas' location.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
